ygData.subject: Guild Matters
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, I think it s time something is done about our guild. We either need more ppl or we need more guild events. Probably the former.Problem is Ziltus and
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,

I think it's time something is done about our guild. We either need more ppl or we need more guild events.
Probably the former.Problem is Ziltus and Leshrec no longer play their wizards. Fesse is also semi retired.
I already have problems finding ppl to group with as it has been last few weeks. Also we dont seem to have
much of an enthusiasm. No offence but i think some things need fixing. Or maybe i'm the only one feeling it hmm...

Unlike a few guilds i've come to know...we really haven't had much of a union as a guild. Lvls pobably play one
part as it prevents effective guild outings. Other is we seem to have bad luck with any so far hehe.

I'd like and hope to see something good that can be done for us all...if not maybe one day i might just leave..
no offence i like you guys but i need to be able to have some fun too..it's hardly fun anymore now for me.
I'll still be on mailing list if i ever leave and i will still give my best at providing any info that no one might have
or help if i ever can...

Of course that's only if i leave (which is unlikely) but i'd thought i just bring it up to you all to be fair...
Thaks for your time

Zanderion Stormseeker
lvl 36 mage

and yes double xp penalty for dying after every hell lvl...ARGH!
just found that out when one whole bubble disappeared
